column168: description:"MiniMax is a leading global technology company and one of the pioneers of large language models (LLMs) in Asia. Our mission is to build a world where intelligence thrives with everyone."
column182: text:"MiniMax Agent is your friendly AI super companion that helps you think faster and achieve more in your daily tasks. It's designed to make your life easier by providing tools for creativity
column186: name:"How can MiniMax Agent help me with meditation?"
column188: text:"MiniMax Agent can generate a soothing 3-minute meditation audio focusing on breath awareness and body sensations. This audio is designed to calm your mind and improve your focus
column189: making it perfect for both kids and seniors."}}
column191: name:"Can MiniMax Agent assist in planning trips?"
column193: text:"Yes! Whether you're planning a family vacation or a solo adventure
column194: MiniMax Agent can help you create detailed itineraries
column195: like a 7-day trip plan to exciting destinations. It's easy and fun!"}}
column197: name:"What types of creative writing can MiniMax Agent assist with?"
column199: text:"MiniMax Agent can help you create various forms of writing
column200: including children's picture books. Just let it know your ideas
column201: and it can help generate a story with illustrations that kids will love."}}
column203: name:"How does MiniMax Agent help with learning?"
column205: text:"It provides interactive quizzes and learning tools
column206: making studies engaging for everyone. From math to language learning
column207: it can guide you or your child in mastering new subjects in a fun way."}}
column209: name:"Can I verify documents with MiniMax Agent?"
column211: text:"Absolutely! MiniMax Agent can help you fact-check citations in documents. It ensures the information is accurate and provides links to verified sources for easier reading and understanding."}}
column213: name:"Is MiniMax Agent able to analyze stocks?"
column216: MiniMax Agent can analyze stock performances and provide insights into investment strategies. It breaks down complex ideas into simple explanations
column219: name:"How do I generate AI videos with MiniMax Agent?"
column222: and MiniMax Agent can help brainstorm catchy names for your AI video project. It's a user-friendly way to kickstart your creative journey with available domain suggestions."}}
column224: name:"Can MiniMax Agent help me find the latest tech gadgets?"
column226: text:"Definitely! MiniMax Agent can help you search for the latest gadgets
column227: such as wireless charging earbuds. It makes finding what you need easy and stress-free."}}
column229: name:"What is the best way to start using MiniMax Agent?"
column234: and start asking questions or giving commands. It's designed to be intuitive for both beginners and those familiar with technology."}}]}
